meanings.sent1: The cheetah easily outdistances the tortoise in a race.
meanings.sent2: The airplane outdistances the car in covering long distances.
meanings.sent3: The snail challenged the hare to a race, knowing it would outdistances it.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed outdistances any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The rocket outdistances the clouds as it soars into the sky.

meanings.definition: To surpass in speed or progress.
meanings.sent1: The sports car outdistances all other vehicles on the racetrack.
meanings.sent2: The student's hard work outdistances his classmates in academic achievements.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outdistances the competition in gathering nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to training outdistances his previous records.
meanings.sent5: The champion runner outdistances all others with her incredible speed.
